content.p: With our ALSIM AL250 the (virtual) sky's the limit Here at UoN you’ll be studying a course that prepares you for your career whilst meeting other people passionate about engineering. You’ll use facilities that have real-world applications, allow for a varied learning environment, and even give you hands on experience with tools that are used in industry. Used in several different modules, our ALSIM AL250 flight simulator has the capability of supporting bespoke flight models – something most UK university flight simulators can’t do. This makes it suitable for research projects and research-led teaching as well as taught labs. You’ll also be able to access our flight simulator as part of extra-curricular sessions led by our aerospace students with piloting experience, either for recreation or as background to more formal training experience. It’s your chance to take to the virtual skies and pilot your own plane! Find out more about our facilities. Faculty of Social Sciences Nottingham provides a proven pathway towards career success alongside unrivalled facilities and valuable industry exposure. School of Mathematical Sciences Everything you need is in one place, making it easy to find. Student experience Transform your future by studying at a world-leading university. Semenyhi campus, Malaysia If you're looking for a British style degree and the opportunity to study in Asia, consider a course at one of our international campuses in China and Malaysia.
